named-query.name: NonEmptyRooms
named-query.query: SELECT r FROM Room r where r.hasPerson=true

named-query.name: Room.markRoomAsNonEmpty
named-query.query: Update Room R set R.hasPerson=true where R=:room

named-query.name: Room.markRoomAsEmpty
named-query.query: Update Room R set R.hasPerson=false where R=:room
